thread.section_title: Busbud Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Busbud | www.busbud.com
thread.title: Amanda

author: Amanda
title: Amanda
text: Really kind and understanding customer service. We tried to book a bus a couple of times but kept getting rejected. Within 2 hours we got a response from them via messenger and was able to clear the whole issue up. Really appreciate their kind support! One thing to mention though... their phone number does not work if you would like to get in touch with them. Messenger seems to be the quickest.
